duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct tax interviews with clients, and support do-it-yourself online tax clients through virtual tools such as video conferencing, phone, chat, and email.
Generate business growth, increase client retention, and offer additional products and services.
Understand that teamwork is essential to success, and communicate and coordinate regularly with leaders and peers about how remote work is impacting results.
Grow tax expertise and inspire confidence in clients by communicating complex tax situations concisely via phone, email, and chat.
Utilize effective customer service techniques and analytical/problem-solving skills. Research information using various tax and publication tools to understand the client's need.
Prepare complex tax returns, provide audit support, and conduct virtual tax interviews that create confidence in clients. Additionally, have experience in tax planning, sales, and marketing.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/equivalent or higher. Must complete 18-hour continuing education requirement and meet all other IRS and applicable state requirements. Availability to work a minimum of 20 hours a week during peak tax season. Enrollment in or completion of the H&R Block Income Tax Course is neither an offer nor a guarantee of employment. It would be even better to have CPA or Enrolled Agent certification, and 5+ years of experience in accounting, finance, bookkeeping, or tax.
